edge: Initially, Ameesha Patel was approached for the female lead in this movie, but she was not available for the film. As a result, Kareena Kapoor was signed to play the leading lady opposite Hrithik Roshan. This marked her first of several collaborations with Roshan.
The movie in which Hrithik Roshan appeared opposite Kareena Kapoor turned out to be a box office failure.
Initially, Ameesha Patel was approached for the female lead opposite Hrithik Roshan in this movie, but she was not available for the film.
In contrast to Ameesha Patel, Kareena Kapoor got signed as the leading lady opposite Hrithik Roshan in this movie.
